attributes.action: Petition against closure of walk-in services - Loxford Polyclinic
attributes.additional_details:
We oppose the CLOSURE because:
- The walk-in service provides a valuable service to local residents.
- No suitable alternative to meet local needs is being proposed.
- There will be increased pressure on GPs, making it even more difficult to get an appointment.
- Residents may resort to going to the A&E for minor illnesses, putting more pressure on A&E.
attributes.background: The Clinical Commission Group (CCG) NHS is undertaking consultation about changes to GP services and proposes CLOSURE of the walk-in services at Loxford Polyclinic.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of your local CCG, not the UK Government or Parliament.
